inclusion.criterion: Symptoms of angina or angina-equivalent informed by the Rose Angina questionnaire.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Intermediate or no obstructive coronary disease i.e. no coronary stenosis >70% in an artery >2.5 mm, as revealed by CT coronary angiography.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: A health problem that would explain the angina, e.g. anaemia, moderate-severe aortic stenosis, hypertrophic obstructive cardiomyopathy
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Obstructive disease evident in a coronary artery (diameter >2.5 mm), i.e. >50 - 70% circumferential plaque extending for ≥2 coronary segments, or a stenosis>70% as revealed by CT coronary angiography
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Flow-limiting coronary disease defined by a fractional flow reserve (FFR) ≤0.80 in an artery>2.5 mm.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has pancreatic adenocarcinoma at the head of pancreas and a splenic/pancreatic tail mass likely diverticular abscess given recent history of diverticulitis.
